eheth, mulika wataye tharaga 6 n shri lankawa samanga tharagaya warshawata sedi giya namuth pawathi thaththwaya hamuwe shri lankawata jaya athwimata thibu bawa wicharakayinge mathayayi.inpasu mewara tharaga malawe peralikarayan wu pakisthanaya samanga tharagaye di aithihasika parajayak labu oostreliyawa, ardha awasan purwa watayedi indiyawa hamuwe parajaya wemin tharagawaliyen iwathata wisi wiya.kese wethath indiya tharagayedi ethek pithikaruwaku lesa sarthakathwayata pathwimata nohakiwa siti riki pontin shathakayak (104) ras kirimata samath wuwada me wana wita ohuge nayakathwaya abhiyogayata lakwi thibe.indiyawa hamuwe labu parajayath samanga madhyayata adahas dakwamin pontin kiya sitiye ema shathakaya ohuge krikat diwiye yali pibidimak athi kala bawayi.engalanthaya samanga pawathi alu banduna tharagawaliyen pasu pontinge nayakathwaya pilibandawa dadi wiwechana ella wunu athara, loka kusalana tharaga parajaya samanga eya thawath ugra athata hari thibe.
